questions.question_text:
A systems administrator in a large enterprise needs to alter the configuration of one of the finance department's database servers.
Which of the following should the administrator perform FIRST?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
X) Configure auto-scaling within the private cloud -> it could be possible in private cloud, with limited resources obviously. See VMWare vSphere
V) B. Set up cloud bursting for the additional resources -> could be a solution because you implement a fast average solution for the 5000 sessions and you burst when you need resources. I have 512GB but not for "maximum concurrent sessions".
X) C. Migrate all workloads to a public cloud provider -> not quick/shortest solution
X) D. Add more capacity to the private cloud -> not quick/shortest solution
IMO, cloud bursting seems to be the best option here

Selected Answer: B
It is Cloud Bursting

choices.B: Set up cloud bursting for the additional resources
choices.C: Migrate all workloads to a public cloud provider
choices.D: Add more capacity to the private cloud
choices.A: Configure auto-scaling within the private cloud

questions.question_text:
An SQL injection vulnerability was reported on a web application, and the cloud platform team needs to mitigate the vulnerability while it is corrected by the development team.
Which of the following controls will BEST mitigate the risk of exploitation?

discussion.content: CDNs are designed to deliver content at the edge.
I think the correct answer is C. A content delivery network (CDN)

questions.question_text:
A technician is working with an American company that is using cloud services to provide video-based training for its customers. Recently, due to a surge in demand, customers in Europe are experiencing latency.
Which of the following services should the technician deploy to eliminate the latency issue?

choices.A: Assign a new IP address of 192.168.100.10 to the web server
choices.B: Modify the firewall on 72.135.10.100 to allow only UDP
choices.C: Configure the WAF to filter requests from 17.3.130.3
choices.D: Update the gateway on the web server to use 72.135.10.1

discussion.content: C is the only answer that makes sense.
